subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the ContextMenu UI component.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<dxContextMenuItem> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null

subMembers.name: hideOnOutsideClick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to hide the UI component if a user clicks outside it.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.description: An object defining UI component [positioning properties].

subMembers.name: delay
subMembers.description: The delay in milliseconds after which the UI component is displayed.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the event names on which the UI component is shown.

subMembers.name: showEvent
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for displaying the UI component.

subMembers.name: submenuDirection
subMembers.description: Specifies the direction at which submenus are displayed.

subMembers.name: target
subMembers.description: The target element associated with the context menu.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the UI component is visible.

properties.name: dxContextMenu
properties.description: The ContextMenu UI component displays a single- or multi-level context menu. An end user invokes this menu by a right click or a long press.

Methods.name: toggle(showing)
Methods.description: Shows or hides the UI component depending on the argument.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed after the ContextMenu is hidden.

Events.name: onHiding
Events.description: A function that is executed before the ContextMenu is hidden.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onPositioning
Events.description: A function that is executed before the ContextMenu is positioned.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: onShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the ContextMenu is shown.

Events.name: onShown
Events.description: A function that is executed after the ContextMenu is shown.

Events.name: hidden
Events.description: Raised after the ContextMenu is hidden.

Events.name: hiding
Events.description: Raised before the ContextMenu is hidden.

Events.name: positioning
Events.description: Raised before the ContextMenu is positioned.

Events.name: showing
Events.description: Raised before the ContextMenu is shown.

Events.name: shown
Events.description: Raised after the ContextMenu is shown.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: HiddenEvent
Types.description: The type of the [hidden] event handler's argument.

Types.name: HidingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [hiding] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemRendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: PositioningEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [positioning] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ShowingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [showing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ShownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [shown] event handler's argument.
